books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: Four friends in Monte Carlo for a luxurious girls’ vacation find themselves in prison.
books.name: GUILTY WIVES

books.author: by J. R. Ward
books.description: Book 10 of the Black Dagger Brotherhood series.
books.name: LOVER REBORN

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A Marine returning home sets out to track down the woman whose photo he found in Iraq.
books.name: THE LUCKY ONE

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: Bailey Flanigan must decide: Will she spend her life with Brandon in Los Angeles, or will her heart draw her back to Cody in Indiana?
books.name: LOVING

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A happy and successful Hollywood director discovers that someone is embezzling large sums of her money.
books.name: BETRAYAL

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: A disappearance in Atlantic City brings together three frustrated people whose lives were once connected.
books.name: STAY CLOSE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by William Landay
books.description: An assistant district attorney’s life is shaken when his 14-year-old son is accused of murder.
books.name: DEFENDING JACOB

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the 40-year-old disappearance of a Swedish heiress.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In Volume 2 of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Lori Foster
books.description: To expose a smuggling ring, the bounty hunter Spencer Lark reluctantly agrees to use Arizona Storm, a woman with dark secrets, as a decoy.
books.name: A PERFECT STORM
